name: The Ol' One Two!
description:
A little boxing game

Made in 2 days as my last minute entry to the 8 Bits to Infinity 2 Button Jam

Music provided by the above

Play using 'f' and 'j' keys

With these 2 keys, you can 

 - punch 

- double punch

 - block

 - and punch while blocking

(more detailed description in the game's readme)
